selections.name: American Direction
selections.reason: Significant class drop from Maiden Special Weight to Maiden Claiming. Consistent speed figures (74, 69) are superior to this field.

selections.name: Moroder
selections.reason: Consistent mid-60s speed figures. Finished 2nd twice recently at this level. Logical contender.

selections.name: Kensington Avenue
selections.reason: Cutting back from a mile where he showed speed. 66 figure last out puts him in the mix.

selections.name: Repetitive
selections.reason: First-time starter with decent works. 2/1 Morning Line suggests insider confidence despite lack of experience.

danger_horse.name: Moroder
danger_horse.reason: Proven consistency at this level makes him a threat if the dropper falters.

selections.name: Jassai
selections.reason: Dominant winner at this exact level and distance last out with a 67 speed figure. Beat key rivals here.

selections.name: Red Eleanor
selections.reason: Coming off a strong 2nd place finish with a 63 speed figure. The clear alternative to the favorite.

selections.name: Shabam
selections.reason: Finished 2nd to Jassai last time out. Consistent check earner.

selections.name: Strand Of Gold
selections.reason: Finished 3rd behind Jassai and Shabam. Likely to be in the exotics again.

selections.name: Utopia Rose
selections.reason: Has back class but recent form (46 speed) is below the top contenders.

danger_horse.name: Red Eleanor
danger_horse.reason: Only horse with a recent speed figure close enough to challenge the favorite.

selections.name: Osprey
selections.reason: Top recent speed figures (80, 77). Finished 2nd last out and won prior. Form is peaking.

selections.name: Rebel Empire
selections.reason: Consistent veteran with a 79 speed figure last out. 3rd place finish shows he is competitive.

selections.name: Star Kanoo
selections.reason: Ran a 75 speed figure last time finishing 2nd. Good fit at this level.

selections.name: Al Ameeq
selections.reason: Has back class but recent 66 figure is a step below the top three.

danger_horse.name: Rebel Empire
danger_horse.reason: High speed figure last out and rail draw makes him a dangerous stalker.

selections.name: Heavenly Dancer
selections.reason: Consistent runner coming off a 2nd place finish. Speed figure (58) fits well here. 9/5 ML favorite.

selections.name: Instabrat
selections.reason: Winner in last start (Sept) with a 61 figure. Layoff is the only concern.

selections.name: Bolt Of Paradise
selections.reason: Ran a 65 speed figure last out despite finishing 5th. Value play at 6/1.

selections.name: Mean To Me
selections.reason: Finished 2nd last out with a 51 figure. In good form.

danger_horse.name: Instabrat
danger_horse.reason: If ready off the layoff, her winning form is best in field.

selections.name: Jersey Joyce
selections.reason: Strong 2nd place finish last out with a 68 speed figure. Consistent turf form.

selections.name: Enchant
selections.reason: Also finished 2nd last out with a 61 figure. 9/5 Morning Line favorite.

selections.name: Addagirl Addie
selections.reason: Ran a 63 speed figure last out. Rail draw helps in a route.

selections.name: Katarzyna
selections.reason: 4th last out with a 58 figure. Should be closing late.

selections.name: Ridgie
selections.reason: Standout on paper with recent speed figures of 74 and 81. Won an AOC recently. The class of the field.

selections.name: Questnbled'cisions
selections.reason: Ran a 76 speed figure last out. Consistent and should be the main threat.

selections.name: Authentic Wave
selections.reason: Won a MSW two back with a 74. 4th last out but capable of rebounding.

selections.name: Prancin Inthe Dark
selections.reason: 3rd last out with a 64 figure. Best of the rest.

danger_horse.name: Questnbled'cisions
danger_horse.reason: Only horse with a recent figure (76) comparable to the top pick.

selections.name: Redbird Nation
selections.reason: Drops in class. Previous dirt form includes a 78 speed figure which crushes this field.

selections.name: Raydar Control
selections.reason: Ran a 65 speed figure last out. Solid form for this level.

selections.name: Fit To Fire
selections.reason: Consistent runner, 3rd last out with a 57. 2/1 ML indicates support.

selections.name: Star Of Abraham
selections.reason: Won last out with a 58. Moving up slightly but in good form.

danger_horse.name: Fit To Fire
danger_horse.reason: Consistent board hitter who will be running late.

selections.name: Midnight Onyx
selections.reason: Won last out at this level with a dominant 86 speed figure. Clear standout on numbers.

selections.name: Scar
selections.reason: Won last out with a 77 figure. The main danger to the top pick.

selections.name: Lucky Curlin
selections.reason: Ran a 76 last out. Consistent mid-70s runner.

selections.name: Fort Charles
selections.reason: 3rd last out with a 73. Solid exotics contender.

danger_horse.name: Scar
danger_horse.reason: Coming off a win and has the speed to challenge.

selections.name: Life Advice
selections.reason: Superior speed figure (80) last out. 9/5 ML favorite looks well-placed here.

selections.name: Authenticate Now
selections.reason: Dropping from Allowance company. Ran a 75 speed figure last out.

selections.name: Midway Vow
selections.reason: Ran a 78 speed figure last out despite finishing 9th. Value underneath.

selections.name: Temple City Taboo
selections.reason: Ran a 76 figure last out. Capable of hitting the board.

danger_horse.name: Authenticate Now
danger_horse.reason: Class relief makes her a major player.
